short_summary: Purchase and delivery of Office Furniture by December 31, 2022
description: Notification of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Category 5 - Monitor Arms for Agricultural Department. , Request for Proposal (RFP) for procurement of office furniture, for a set aside for Aboriginal Business. Procurement for test. Procurement is a contract.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Category 5 - Office Monitor Arms

---

**Title:** Category 5 - Office Monitor Arms
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01013367
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** 5000070939
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-11
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-23T14:00:00

**Notice Details:**

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business (PSAB) stream, set aside for Indigenous businesses.

**Notice Purpose:**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites suppliers to submit proposals for the purchase and delivery of office furniture, specifically monitor arms, to the National Capital Region (NCR) by December 31, 2022.

**Notice Highlights:**

* Category 5 - Ancillary and Lighting Products
* Office furniture requirement for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* RFP set aside for Indigenous businesses under the PSAB stream
* Delivered to the National Capital Region (NCR) by December 31, 2022

**Eligible Suppliers:**
This procurement is open to suppliers with a valid Supplier Business Number (SBN) and who are members of the PSAB stream.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Leopoldo Guzzo
* Email: [Leopoldo.Guzzo@agr.gc.ca](mailto:Leopoldo.Guzzo@agr.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-573-6479

**Notice Documents:**

* Quebec and English Questions and Answers documents are available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/docs](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/docs).
* Category 5 - Monitor Arms documentation is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/docs](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/docs).

---

This tender announcement is only available in English- but we did take the time to include the French keys and text as a thank you to your client. There you have it! Your expertly written and rephrased entry is now ready to go. Good luck!  Feel free to ask me for any further assistance.
